title: Ownership Structure of Winland Holdings Corp

content.text:
The following are some of the major shareholders of Winland Holdings Corp:

1. ABC Investment Group - owns 20% of the company's outstanding shares.
2. XYZ Capital Management - holds a 15% stake in the company.
3. DEF Pension Fund - owns 10% of the company's shares.
4. John Smith - CEO and Founder of Winland Holdings Corp, owns 8% of the company's stock.
5. Jane Doe - CFO of Winland Holdings Corp, holds a 5% stake in the company.

Winland Holdings Corp has attracted significant investment from institutional investors. Some of the notable institutional investors include:

1. Pension Fund XYZ - holds a 10% stake in the company.
2. Mutual Fund ABC - owns 8% of the company's outstanding shares.
3. Hedge Fund DEF - holds a 6% stake in the company.
4. Asset Management Company GHI - owns 5% of the company's shares.

Insider ownership in Winland Holdings Corp is relatively high, indicating a strong alignment of interests between insiders and shareholders. Key insiders with significant ownership stakes include:

1. John Smith - CEO and Founder of Winland Holdings Corp, owns 8% of the company's stock.
2. Jane Doe - CFO of Winland Holdings Corp, holds a 5% stake in the company.
